features.description: Features rich osu! server with support for Relax, Autopilot and ScoreV2 gameplay, with a custom art‑state PP calculation system tailored for Relax and Autopilot.

free_features.title: Truly Free Features
free_features.description: Enjoy features like osu!direct and username changes without any paywalls — completely free for all players!

pp_system.title: Custom PP Calculations
pp_system.description: We use the latest performance point (PP) system for vanilla scores while applying a custom, well-balanced formula for Relax and Autopilot modes.

medals.title: Earn Custom Medals
medals.description: Earn unique, server-exclusive medals as you accomplish various milestones and achievements.

updates.title: Frequent Updates
updates.description: We’re always improving! Expect regular updates, new features, and ongoing performance optimizations.

pp_calc.title: Built-in PP Calculator
pp_calc.description: Our website offers a built-in PP calculator for quick and easy performance point estimates.

sunrise_core.title: Custom-Built Bancho Core
sunrise_core.description: Unlike most private osu! servers, we’ve developed our own custom bancho core for better stability and unique feature support.

how_to_start.title: How do I start playing?
how_to_start.description: Just three simple steps and you're ready to go!

download_tile.title: Download osu! clinet
download_tile.description: If you do not already have an installed client

registr_tile.title: Register osu!sunrise account
registr_tile.description: Account will allow you to join the osu!sunrise community

guide_tuile.title: Follow the connection guide
guide_tuile.description: Which helps you set up your osu! client to connect to osu!sunrise
